title: vip4e
author: vip4e
content: This goes to all fellow bounty hunters. prolly went under most people's radars.zondacrypto, a CEX popular in the CEE region, is doing a 1 BTC giveaway that ends in October.The prize pool is 1 BTC, and it will be split between 280 winners with prizes up to 2.5k USD. Since its local I guess it's easier to win, their SM numbers are very low, so it's a relatively high chance to win.Regulated in Estonia and recently shared some mica-ready license so seems abruptly safe.Entrants need to follow SM, register and make a purchase.More details here: https://zondacrypto.com/en/news/zondacryptos-bitcoin-giveaway-win-1-btc-and-elevate-your-crypto-journey
